quote: The sea, like a crinkled chart, spread to the horizon, and lapped the sharp outline of the coast, while the houses were white shells in a rounded grotto, pricked here and there by a great orange sun.
quote_letters: THE SEA LIKE A CRINKLED CHART SPREAD TO THE HORIZON AND LAPPED THE SHARP OUTLINE OF THE COAST WHILE THE HOUSES WERE WHITE SHELLS IN A ROUNDED GROTTO PRICKED HERE AND THERE BY A GREAT ORANGE SUN
